original_title: 家賃の代わりに母親に売られた少女　監禁調教7日間 微乳少女を飼いならす
overview: Mom can’t pay rent anymore, and the evil landlord convinced her to pay up with the daughter.  Mom reluctantly agrees and drugs her daughter Rara.  Rara wakes up in a strange place and realizes her Mom has sold her. Feeling betrayed, something died inside her.  The old landlord had no moral problems tho. Even more, he even invites friends to partake.
title: Girl Sold by Her Mother in Exchange for Rent – 7 Days of Confinement and Training – Taming a Young Lady with Small Breasts – Lara Kudo
